text: @CNN That is may never be eliminated is not surprising, but we have conquered viruses before with vaccines and we will with COVID-19 also, it just takes time.  ALL VIRUSES MUTATE and perhaps this one will mutate itself into oblivion at some point!  We can hope it will!
